Interface Upstream

All Superinterfaces:
Streamable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Upstream.PostEvent, Upstream.ServiceCall, Upstream.Subscribe, Upstream.Unsubscribe
public interface Upstream
extends Streamable

A base interface for all messages sent to a server.

          Used to dispatch upstream messages.
